4300690.name: Revival
4300690.description:
Revival is a third-person sci-fi action-adventure set in a vast interconnected world. Hunt colossal bosses, solve environmental puzzles, and salvage alien technology to repair your ship and escape a hostile planet. Your choices matter — save or ignore survivors, unlocking new missions, allies in combat, and narrative consequences that shape your journey through a dynamic, atmospheric world.

  • Explore a ruined world: Uncover the story behind the planet’s decay while navigating environmental puzzles.

  • Master agile combat: Grapple, dash, and leap to outmaneuver colossal bosses.

  • Impact the story: Every character you meet has a story, and your choices influence how the world reacts.

  • Dynamic environments: Weather and environmental effects change combat strategies and shape story interactions.
4300690.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
